Html:
Hello,

Fantastic lib!! If only you had more time..

 I'm curious as to how hard it would be to modify source to integrate the svg or (other) namespaces e.g altova? And what would be involved.

Thanks
Thanks! The original FOP 0.20.4 code did have an "extension" mechanism. It would probably take a few days to implement something similar and then an unknown amount of time for each extension.
